net.proteusframework.users.prefs

Class HPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.prefs.Preferences
      • java.util.prefs.AbstractPreferences
        • net.proteusframework.users.prefs.HPreferences

  • public class HPreferences
extends java.util.prefs.AbstractPreferences
    java.util.prefs.Preferences implementation for server side applications. To make use of user preference nodes, you should implement some type of authentication in your web application using the acegi-utils module.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    HPreferencesFactory, Preferences
